ygData.subject: Re: 1-Handed
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about you guys...it takes me a while to level....i try to max my 1H Slashing, 1H Blunt, 2H Slashing, and Hand to Hand.  I don t see myself using
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about you guys...it takes me a while to level....i try to max
my 1H Slashing, 1H Blunt, 2H Slashing, and Hand to Hand. I don't see
myself using 2H Blunt. I figure for all the free practise trainings you
get at your guild....why not throw one or two into each. The lower the
skill level vs a higher level critter, you stats will raise quite quick.
Not that I will always use these skills....but its good to be versatile.

Korm
Cazic Thule server.
